issue.title: Display EXTRACT version + link to easysdi.org
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves *Description* * In order to facilitate support and communication, it is necessary to display the currently installed (full) version, the project site and the GPL license. * This content must be added to a new panel on the configuration page, named "About EXTRACT" * Content: "EXTRACT is part of the open source project easySDI and is distributed under GPLv3 license.
Installed version : {fullversion}" / "EXTRACT fait partie du projet open source easySDI et est distribué sous licence GPLv3.
Version installée : {fullversion}" *Model* !17762-about-extract.png! Source : https://projets.asitvd.ch/issues/17762 **Fixed versions :** 4.5.1
